children.subject: The workload can be difficult at times, especially when 162-proj2 is released around the time 161-proj2 is due. But generally, the workload is manageable. Also, 162 only had 3 midterms this semester and no final.

Hi OP. I'll be taking CS 162 and CS 161 together on the Fall and was wondering what to expect. Could you comment on the general workload of the two courses when taken in the same semester? Also, what do you wish you knew going into the semester that would help me prepare for both classes? Thanks!

history.content:
I am taking 161, 162, and 7B this semester as a graduating senior. I am certain I will get As in 161 and 162 but no so certain about an A in 7B. Would it hurt me to PNP 7B only? I have no intention to use the material in 7B in the future. Also I do not particularly enjoy the concepts in the class. Also I received a C+ in 7A for the same reasons on disinterest and am hoping that doesn't happen to me again in 7B.

I plan to apply to a MBA program in the future but want to make sure a P in Physics doesn't look terrible alongside two As in 161 and 162.
history.subject: PNP Physics 7B
